mapper.select: select C1.TASK_CONTENT_ID,C2.TASK_CONTENT_NAME,C2.EQU_NAME,C1.DISPORE,C1.OILS,C1."VALUE" from IOT_INSPECTION_VALUE_RH c1,CZ_TASK_INSPECTION_CONTENT c2,CZ_TASK_INSPECTION_STATE c3 where C1.TASK_CONTENT_ID=C2.TASK_CONTENT_ID and TASK_REQUIRE_ID='null' and c3.IVID=c1.TASK_PIID and c3.PLAN_ID=#{schemeId} AND to_char(c3.RECORD_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{recordDay} ORDER BY C2.TASK_CONTENT_ORDER

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C1.TASK_REQUIRE_ID,c1.TASK_CONTENT_ID,C1.TASK_REQUIRE_CONTEXT,C1.TASK_REQUIRE_ORDER FROM CZ_TASK_INSPECTION_REQUIRE C1,CZ_TASK_INSPECTION_CONTENT C2, CZ_TASK_INSPECTION_POINT C3 ,CZ_TASK_INSPECTION C4 ,CZ_TASK_INSPECTION_STATE C5 WHERE C1.TASK_CONTENT_ID= C2.TASK_CONTENT_ID AND C2.TASK_POINT_ID=C3.TASK_POINT_ID AND C3.TASK_ID=C4.TASK_ID AND C4.SCHEME_ID=C5.PLAN_ID AND C5.PLAN_ID=#{schemeId} AND TO_CHAR(C5.RECORD_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{recordDay} ORDER BY TASK_REQUIRE_ORDER ) T LEFT JOIN IOT_INSPECTION_VALUE_RH I1 ON T.TASK_REQUIRE_ID=I1.TASK_REQUIRE_ID

select OILS,to_char(to_date(RECORD_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm') times,SUM("VALUE") as amount from IOT_INSPECTION_VALUE_RH where TASK_REQUIRE_ID='null' and DISPORE != 'null' and DISPORE != '上报问题' and to_char(to_date(RECORD_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy')=#{year} group BY OILS,to_char(to_date(RECORD_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm')

select i2.ONAME,to_char(i1.RTIME,'yyyy-mm') times,SUM(RAMOUNT) as amount from IOT_EQUIPMENT_OIL_RECORD i1,IOT_EQUIPMENT_LUBRICATION_OIL i2 where i1.oid=i2.oid and to_char(i1.RTIME,'yyyy')=#{year} GROUP BY i2.ONAME,to_char(i1.RTIME,'yyyy-mm')

select i3.oid,i1.lnamekey,i1.lname,i2.pplace,i2.requireoil1 ,i3.OSIGN,i3.MANUFACTURE,i4.RINOUT,i4.RTIME,i4.RAMOUNT,i4.USERID,i4.RNOTE ,(select sum(RAMOUNT) from IOT_EQUIPMENT_OIL_RECORD where i3.oid=oid and RINOUT='加') as SUPPLEMENT ,(select sum(RAMOUNT) from IOT_EQUIPMENT_OIL_RECORD where i3.oid=oid and RINOUT='减') as EXCHANGES from IOT_EQUIPMENT_LUBRICATE i1, IOT_EQUIPMENT_LUBRICATE_PLACE i2, IOT_EQUIPMENT_LUBRICATION_OIL i3, IOT_EQUIPMENT_OIL_RECORD i4 where i1.lid=i2.lid and i2.REQUIREOIL1=i3.ONAME and i3.oid=i4.oid
